description.value:
Prerequisite Frost Oropin

You can channel primal frost through your breath. You breathe out a @Template[type:cone|distance:15]  of freezing moisture that quickly condenses into ice, dealing [[/r {2d6}[cold]]]{2d6 cold damage}. Each creature in the cone must attempt a basic Reflex save against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true]. A creature that fails its save also takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Cold1d6.success]. You can’t use Chill Breath again for [[/r 1d4 #Chill Breath Recharge]]{1d4 rounds}.

The initial and persistent damage increases by 1d6 at level 13 and again at level 17.

 

[[/r floor((@actor.level-5)/4)d6[cold]]]{Roll for Damage}
